t: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

a: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
t: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
And his wife [as well] -  the carrier of firewood.
Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
